36 namespace Ogre
37 {
41 struct LodLevel {
48  enum VertexReductionMethod {
54  VRM_PROPORTIONAL,
55 
61  VRM_CONSTANT,
62 
69  VRM_COLLAPSE_COST
70  };
71 
77  Real distance;
78 
84  VertexReductionMethod reductionMethod;
85 
89  Real reductionValue;
90 
96  size_t outUniqueVertexCount;
97 
101  bool outSkipped;
102 };
103 
104 struct LodConfig {
